name: Kyouka Fuushi
description: When your Kamisato Ayato, who has this card equipped, triggers the effects of Takimeguri Kanka, deal +2 additional DMG if the target's remaining HP is equal to or less than 6.
descriptionraw: When your $[A1206], who has this card equipped, triggers the effects of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112061]</color>, deal +2 additional DMG if the target's remaining HP is equal to or less than 6.
descriptionreplaced: When your Kamisato Ayato, who has this card equipped, triggers the effects of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Takimeguri Kanka</color>, deal +2 additional DMG if the target's remaining HP is equal to or less than 6.
